main event: On September 29, 1960, an unidentified flying object was reported sighted in Wolfe City, Texas, displaying unusual motion and light characteristics.
interesting points: The sighting occurred between 06:00 and 07:00 with varying lengths of observation., The object was described as having a general appearance similar to a star or planet., Witnesses noted that the object exhibited silent maneuvering consistent with satellites or guided missiles., A total of three witnesses corroborated the sighting, confirming the object's motions and color changes., The report mentions additional sightings reported from several other southern states during the same time period.
sighted object: one unidentified flying object displaying unusual lights and movements
witness description: The primary witness was an inactive Air Force Reservist familiar with aircraft and other aerial phenomena.
